entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
